storyInfo: Emperor and High Priest help repair the floats. Ingrid discovers the identity of the culprit that she is pursuing. The old tailor suggests she leave. Gambino controls the port's dispatch at Venezia Junior's orders, but Lappland shows up.

attributes.content: Pizza delivery from 'One More Slice'!
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: Pumpkin Pepper, Cheese, Fries & Sausage, Supreme, Devil's Pepper, and classic Mozzarella.
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: Eat up! Can't work on an empty stomach. This one's yours, Signor Emperor... er, should I call you Consultant instead?
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: Mm. Not bad. Soft and chewy crust, nice meaty flavor. You got a card for this pizzeria?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: I made it myself at the dock workers' kitchen.
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: I can write down the recipe for you, if you want.
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: Mmâ€”
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: No need to be shy, it's the least we can do.
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: If not for your help, we couldn't possibly have fixed all the damaged floats before the parade tonight.
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: I'm just thinkin' how authentic Siracusan pizza might go over with the Lungmenites. Maybe Exusiai could add it to the menu at The Ends of the Earth.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: What about that signore who's singing while working? Should I call him over?
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: Hey, Big Mouth, over here! This'll shut you up.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: I don't know what's worse, the way you break into song anytime anywhere, that obnoxious singin' voice of yours, or the song itself...
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: I mean, what's that crap? You belt that out while clappin' together your building blocks in the jungle?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Can't find the energy to work without song.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Unlike you, who's just sitting there giving 'advice', I'm the one who has to put in the work and sweat!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: You got a reason to do that, I don't.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: It was your float that got its ass burned off, wasn't it?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: It was bad enough that it didn't look cool at all, but how could they put me so close to that wolf?!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Well, all the other floats have their arms and legs stuck back in place. The only one left is the wolf that's just a pile of ash now.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: If you ask me, it makes more sense to spend the time making the other floats look cooler than rebuilding one float.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: There are so many floats, who would miss one wolf?
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Fair 'nuff.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: N-No! You can't do that!
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: There are many legends of beasts in Siracusa, but the wolf is special.
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: City Hall had already announced the number of floats and what they're based on. People will get anxious if one is missing.
attributes.name: Noemi
High Priest
attributes.content: You knowâ€”

attributes.name: High Priest
attributes.content: Hey fatso, stop stuffing that pie in my mouthâ€”

attributes.name: High Priest
attributes.content: Pineapple? On pizza? Now THAT is what I call radical.
attributes.joined: You knowâ€”Hey fatso, stop stuffing that pie in my mouthâ€”Pineapple? On pizza? Now THAT is what I call radical.

attributes.content: Do all Siracusan cops have to learn to make pizza?
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Oh no, my papa has a pizzeria in another city, and I used to help out there.
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: We're pretty well-known. When I was little, I dreamed about having branches all over Siracusa, even our own dedicated headquarters plate.
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: Maybe you've heard of our ad? 'Noemi Pizzaâ€”one more slice even when you're full!'
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Emperor & High Priest

attributes.content: We never had the money to start a second one.
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: Business was good, and no one dares to not pay for their food, but paying our protection fee takes up most of our profit.
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: I came when I heard that the Nuova Volsinii Police Academy was recruiting. Maybe I'll be able to protect the shop once I become a cop.
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: Uh...
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: I know what you want to say. It sounds naive, doesn't it? Being a cop is much harder, and then there's all the trouble that's popped up these last couple of days.
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: Think of this another way.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Becomin' a cop means you can change your sloganâ€”
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: 'Noemi Pizzaâ€”if it isn't good, you can lock ME up!'
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: You remind me of my Zumama. The young always have such simple goals and such strong motivation.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: This is all YOUR fault, fatso. I didn't even have time to tell Zumama I was coming here.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Ain't many parties worth bringing us together, Big Mouth.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Besides, we got serious business to talk about after the party.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Anyway, I really appreciate it! We were at our wit's end when you guys offered to help.
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: As for your compensation, I'll put in an application with City Hall as soon as the Carnevale is over.
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: We got our compensation already.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Emperor puts another pizza slice in his mouth.
We'll see this through to the end. This IS good pizza, after all.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: High Priest puts another pizza in his mouth.
Gotta admit, it gives me a warm n' fuzzy feelin' to see that wolf burn to ashes.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: So you...
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: But it don't compare to the anger I feel when a good party gets ruined.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Oh, cruel fate!
attributes.name: Forlorn Merchant

attributes.content: All the other stalls are busy preparing to make a killing tonight. We're the only ones who have been given the death sentence.
attributes.name: Forlorn Merchant

attributes.content: I don't care, you're eating all the losses.
attributes.name: Forlorn Merchant

attributes.content: That's just not fair. I did what I did with good intentions! I was trying to minimize the losses when the rain hit the other day.
attributes.name: Obstinate Partner

attributes.content: By getting the beer cart instead of the food drying in the courtyard out in the open?
attributes.name: Forlorn Merchant

attributes.content: Mistakes happen...
attributes.name: Obstinate Partner

attributes.content: The beer cart is fully enclosed and equipped with a functioning thermostat. Who cares if it gets a little rain on it? But you had to push it back, and now you cost me the spot that took me so much effort to get!
attributes.name: Forlorn Merchant

attributes.content: No stall, no food. This ain't a Carnevale, it's my funeral!
attributes.name: Forlorn Merchant

attributes.content: I should have stuck to movies. Yes, I had to deal with the mafiosi who all fancy themselves filmmakers, but at least I got to make a living. I shouldn't have listened to your tall tales and come hereâ€”
attributes.name: Forlorn Merchant

attributes.content: Y-You again!
attributes.name: Obstinate Partner

attributes.content: Zzz... zzz...
You're still here? Did you fall asleep on the spot after that ice cream?
attributes.name: Forlorn Merchant
Forlorn Merchant
attributes.content: Father? Father!

attributes.name: Forlorn Merchant
attributes.content: â€”I really should take a photo of you right now!
attributes.joined: Father? Father!â€”I really should take a photo of you right now!

attributes.content: So what's stopping you?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: I'll pay if it looks good.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Forlorn Merchant

attributes.content: You said photo, right?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Forlorn Merchant

attributes.content: Today is the biggest day of Nuova Volsinii. Everyone will show up fully dressed.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Masks, costumes, and massive, mysterious floats. Definitely something I would want to take a few photos of, for the memories.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: But I can't stop for something like that, not when the parade keeps rolling. Wouldn't it be great if there was a professional photographer who could do it in my stead?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Besides, it's better business than competing with everyone else selling beer and ice creamâ€”and to tell you the truth, your ice cream isn't that competitive. Not sweet enough.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: You heard the Father, what are you still standing around for?
attributes.name: Forlorn Merchant

attributes.content: H-huh, what's happening now?
attributes.name: Obstinate Partner

attributes.content: Go and get the camera! And don't forget to buy a few more rolls of film!
attributes.name: Forlorn Merchant

attributes.content: Thank you. Can't have two furs in one tail. Looks like this guy and I just don't match.
attributes.name: Forlorn Merchant

attributes.content: Problems always float to the surface, and there are always ways to deal with them.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: I don't think there's a church in this town... where did you come from, Father?
attributes.name: Forlorn Merchant

attributes.content: Montelupe.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: The capital... did you come all this way for Carnevale?
attributes.name: Forlorn Merchant

attributes.content: An old friend asked me to see what it's all about.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: It's been a long time since Siracusa has had something this big, after all.
attributes.name: Forlorn Merchant

attributes.content: Like Leithanien's Empresses' Celebration, which takes place every year and involves the entire country, and it just gets bigger every year...
attributes.name: Forlorn Merchant

attributes.content: Yes, it's been a long time since Siracusa has had something this big.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: I hope it doesn't rain. It would make it so much harder to keep the peace.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: What are you doing, Signora Venezia?
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: You're not using this cloth anymore, right? Picked it out of the discard pile. Just right for wiping my blade.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I could get a piece of softer cotton cloth for you.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: No need for that.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: There will be festivities on every street tonight. There's no need for you to stay at Tailor de Montano.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: I promised Vargo to solve your problem.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: You found Luchino and accompanied me to the Villa Venezia to bring him back. You've already helped so much. Thank you.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: There's no need to thank me, Umberto.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: You saved Luchino yourself, by convincing Venezia Senior to not pursue the matter any further.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Is he still shutting himself in the room? I haven't seen him. Don't tell me he's ran away again.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: If he runs away, just let him. So much has happened over the past couple of days, and he's still young. He needs time to process things.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Perhaps I've been too strict.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Maybe he's just struggling with how to view you, his own grandfather, an old tailor, and once the terror of Siracusan dons.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Well, that's not important. What's important is how he views himself after he stood at death's door and learned about all these things in the past.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: And he needs to figure it out. I don't have that much time left.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Well, Signora Venezia, I bid you addio.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: You already know, don't you?
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: The culprit who hurt your daughter.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: And why would you say that?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Did you forget I was once a killer too, Signora Venezia?
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Your weapon is sharp. It needs no honing, and you are not in the habit of doing so.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: When a killer starts polishing their blade, they're either planning to put it away forever, or planning to put it in someone.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Fair point.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: More conjecture than proof at this point... but at least I have something. That's why I said you don't have to thank me.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: You came to Nuova Volsinii and stayed here at de Montano to learn about the truthâ€”who planned the assassination, and hurt Signorina Lisa.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: This was your agreement with Vargo, but if you have learned the answer, there's no reason to continue it.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Besides, I don't have any troubles left to deal with.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: The game is not over yet. The Fangs are still in the city. I've crossed blades with them. They may be young, but they fight well.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: If I can find them, they can find you.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: You're old and frail, Umberto. There can only be one end.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: It's an end that already looms large. There's nothing you can do.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Tonight, at least, I wish to be alone, and have a moment of quiet to myself.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: <p=2>November 9th, 1100    4:00 P.M.</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp
Port Worker
attributes.content: Alright, we'll be goingâ€”

attributes.name: Port Worker
attributes.content: Hey, new face. Where's the old dispatcher?
attributes.joined: Alright, we'll be goingâ€”Hey, new face. Where's the old dispatcher?

attributes.content: ...Shift changed half an hour ago. He's probably in rehearsal right now.
attributes.name: Dispatcher

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Port Worker

attributes.content: Didn't you know? He used to be a saxist at the Teatro di Milano. They recruited him for the parade.
attributes.name: Dispatcher

attributes.content: I see. He's keeping you in the dark so he can show off tomorrow when his face is in the newspapers!
attributes.name: Dispatcher

attributes.content: Stronzo!
attributes.name: Port Worker

attributes.content: So you're on duty tonight?
attributes.name: Port Worker

attributes.content: Yup, I'm the new guy. On the bright side, the harbor's gonna be rather quiet because of all the festivities.
attributes.name: Dispatcher

attributes.content: I'll turn the radio up and feel the festive spirit from here.
attributes.name: Dispatcher

attributes.content: I would go now if I were you... if you want to get a good place in the procession.
attributes.name: Dispatcher

attributes.content: Alright, be seeing you.
attributes.name: Port Worker

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Dispatcher

attributes.content: You almost let it slip.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: How about you do it, then?
attributes.name: 'Dispatcher'

attributes.content: Hey, I don't got the acting experience. You're the one who's an extra in the mayor's promotional video.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: It ain't the same thing. I was just being myself in the promo, and we could always do another take. Screw up just now, and all of Antonio's plans would've been blown.
attributes.name: 'Dispatcher'

attributes.content: This is an important night for you, for me, and for all of Venezia.
attributes.name: 'Dispatcher'

attributes.content: Once this city is firmly under our control, Antonio will be as good as his word. He'll support you in... what's the wording? Restoring the glory of Sicilia?
attributes.name: 'Dispatcher'
Gambino
attributes.content: I just hope I don't end up like Carle...

attributes.name: Gambino
attributes.content: What about our musicista?
attributes.joined: I just hope I don't end up like Carle...What about our musicista?

attributes.content: Playing his saxophone in hell. In that container over there. We'll deal with the body once the dust settles.
attributes.name: 'Dispatcher'

attributes.content: You got the dispatch station, then.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Don't worry.
attributes.name: 'Dispatcher'

attributes.content: Every vehicle that goes in and out of the port has to go through special checks. Venezia Trucking's trucks have been added to the list.
attributes.name: 'Dispatcher'

attributes.content: The nomadic city's positioning system has been turned off, with the exception of a single encrypted channel. Other than the famiglia's landship, no vehicles will approach the city tonight.
attributes.name: 'Dispatcher'

attributes.content: The rest of the boys are outside. Once the landship approaches the city and starts docking, everybody in Nuova Volsinii Port who ain't part of this is gonna disappear.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: What about Antonio?
attributes.name: 'Dispatcher'

attributes.content: You think the boss needs us to worry about him?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: A few hours left... enjoy the night, Nuova Volsinii. Enjoy the true Carnevale.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Bit trite for an opening speech, don't you think?
The voice came from above.
The White Wolf looks down at them from atop a crane, amusement on her face, surprise and shock on theirs. She frowns, like a listener who can no longer tolerate the performance.
Who are you? Have you been here all this time?
attributes.name: 'Dispatcher'

attributes.content: Do her in, Gambino!
attributes.name: 'Dispatcher'

attributes.content: Gotcha.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: I thought you said it was trite. But you're clappin'.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: You just gave me the first twist, didn't you?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You know, I was kind of hoping you would try toâ€”how did he put it? 'Do me in.'
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I wanted to, but I ain't about to do somethin' doomed to fail.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Fair enough. Where's your little friend?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Capone? Helpin' Venezia Junior with some other stuff.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Sicilians been busy, eh?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Whaddya want, Lappland?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: We've done enough for you. I can'tâ€”
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Uh, I mean...
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Venezia Junior has put everything the famiglia's built over the past year into this. At this point, even if you wanna sabotage it, there's not much I can do to help.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: You still think you know me, Gambino. Why would I make things hard for an old, er, friend?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Just do the job that your boss told you to.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: What he's trying to do doesn't conflict with what I'm trying to do. Maybe I'm even trying to help him?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: It's Carnevale, after all. The night when all the wonderful dreams we have about this city come true.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: That's why you didn't even need to kill this guy on the groundâ€”oops.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You really shouldn't be so eager to prove that you're a villain. No wonder Capone's racking up citizen points so much faster than you.
attributes.name: Lappland
Gambino
attributes.content: *Sigh*

attributes.name: Gambino
attributes.content: What else do you want me to do?
attributes.joined: *Sigh*What else do you want me to do?

attributes.content: I dropped something at the Villa Venezia. Bring it to me.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: A gift box.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You mean, the one that the little tailor wasâ€”
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Uh-huh.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: And get me a bunch of ribbons, balloons, spotlights, that kind of stuff. Hurry!
attributes.name: Lappland
